title: SDET I/II
description:
**WHO ARE WE?** 




 We are a bunch of super enthusiastic, passionate, and highly driven people, working to achieve a common goal! We believe that work and the workplace should be joyful and always buzzing with energy!
 



  





**CloudSEK,**
 one of India‚Äôs most trusted Cyber security product companies, is on a mission to build the world‚Äôs fastest and most reliable AI technology that identifies and resolves digital threats in real\\-time. The central proposition is leveraging Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning to create a quick and reliable analysis and alert system that provides rapid detection across multiple internet sources, precise threat analysis, and prompt resolution with minimal
 



 human intervention.
 



  





 Founded in 2015, headquartered at Singapore, we are proud to say that we‚Äôve grown at a frenetic pace and have been able to achieve some accolades along the way, including:
 



  





**CloudSEK‚Äôs Product Suite:** 



* CloudSEK
 **XVigil** 
 constantly maps a customer‚Äôs digital assets, identifies threats and enriches them with cyber intelligence, and then provides workflows to manage and remediate all identified threats including takedown support.
* A powerful Attack Surface Monitoring
 
 tool that gives visibility and intelligence on customers‚Äô attack surfaces. CloudSEK's
 **BeVigil** 
 uses a combination of Mobile, Web, Network and Encryption Scanners to map and protect known and unknown assets.
* CloudSEK‚Äôs Contextual AI
 **SVigil** 
 identifies software supply chain risks by monitoring Software, Cloud Services, and third\\-party dependencies.



**Key Milestones:** 



* **2016** 
 : Launched our first product.
* **2018** 
 : Secured Pre\\-series A funding.
* **2019** 
 : Expanded operations to India, Southeast Asia, and the Americas.
* **2020** 
 : Won the NASSCOM\\-DSCI Excellence Award for Security Product Company of the Year.
* **2021** 
 : Raised $7M in Series A funding led by MassMutual Ventures.
* **Awards \\& Recognition** 
 : Won NetApp Excellerator's "Best Growth Strategy Award," CloudSEK XVigil joined NVIDIA Inception Program, and won the NASSCOM Emerge 50 Cybersecurity Award.
* **2025** 
 : Secured $19 million in funding led by Tenacity Ventures, Commvault.



  





**Role Description:** 




 We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated
 **Software Development Engineer in Test** 
 I/II (SDET I/II) to join our dynamic team at CloudSEK. As an SDET I/II you will play a crucial role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our cybersecurity products through the design and implementation of automated testing solutions.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 



* Develop and maintain automated test scripts using Python, Selenium, and Pytest to validate the functionality, performance, and security of our cybersecurity products.
* Collaborate with software developers, quality assurance engineers, and other cross\\-functional teams to understand product requirements and design effective test strategies.
* Create and execute test plans, test cases, and test scenarios to identify software defects and ensure high product quality.
* Work closely with the development team to integrate automated tests into the continuous integration (CI) and continuous deployment (CD) pipelines.
* Investigate, troubleshoot, and provide detailed bug reports for identified issues, and work with the development team to ensure timely resolution.
* Stay updated on industry best practices, emerging technologies, and trends in software testing and cybersecurity.



  





**Requirements:** 



* Proven experience as an SDET or in a similar role, with a focus on automated testing.
* Strong programming skills in Python.
* Experience with test automation frameworks, such as Selenium and Pytest.
* Knowledge of API testing and familiarity with tools for testing APIs.
* Solid understanding of software development life cycle (SDLC) and software testing methodologies.
* Excellent analytical and problem\\-solving skills.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills.



  





**Preferred Qualifications:** 



* Experience with cloud platforms and services.
* Familiarity with cybersecurity concepts and practices.
* Experience with performance testing tools and methodologies.



  





**Benefits of Joining CloudSEK** 




 We provide an environment where you can develop and enhance your skills while delivering meaningful work that matters. You‚Äôll be rewarded a competitive salary as well as a full spectrum of generous perks and incentives which include:
 


* Flexible working hours.
* Food, unlimited snacks and drinks are all available while at office.



  





 And, the finest part is yet to come! Every now and then we ensure to unwind and have a good time together, which involves games, fun, and soulful music. Feel free to show off your artistic side here!

title: Tech Lead
description:
**About KushoAI** 




 KushoAI is an AI\\-native developer productivity platform built for modern engineering teams. Our mission is to eliminate the busywork from software development so developers can focus on building, creating, and shipping their best work. The platform uses advanced generative AI to make software maintenance autonomous, embedding intelligent agents directly into real engineering workflows.
 



 Founded in 2022 by BITS alumni and backed by leading global investors, KushoAI brings cutting\\-edge AI into the heart of software teams. We work with fast\\-growing startups and mid\\-to\\-large enterprises that rely on stable releases, complex testing environments, and high\\-velocity shipping cycles. Many of our customers operate in controlled or hybrid environments, require on\\-prem deployments, and need tailored integrations that adapt to their internal tooling and constraints.
 



 If you enjoy solving ambiguous, high\\-impact problems and building technology that directly affects how engineering teams ship software, you‚Äôll feel right at home.
 



  





**The role** 




 We‚Äôre hiring a Tech Lead \\- an engineering leader who is hands\\-on, customer\\-facing, and deeply involved in both platform evolution and real\\-world deployments.
 



 You‚Äôll own platform improvements, stability initiatives, on\\-prem enterprise deployments, customer customizations, and end\\-to\\-end delivery of mission\\-critical features. You‚Äôll also lead a small engineering group of two to three people, guiding execution, mentoring team members, and ensuring high\\-quality delivery across multiple active workstreams.
 



 This role sits at the core of KushoAI‚Äôs product and customer impact. You‚Äôll work closely with the founders, influence product direction, and be responsible for shipping reliable, scalable, and secure solutions in environments where correctness matters.
 



 We‚Äôre currently remote\\-first with the team based in Bangalore.
 



  





**The ideal candidate** 




 We‚Äôre an engineering\\-first team focused on building foundational systems at the intersection of AI, testing, and developer tooling. If you enjoy untangling complex deployment environments, architecting adaptable systems, and collaborating directly with customers to solve high\\-stakes problems, this role will excite you.
 



 We value technical depth, ownership, pragmatism, and the drive to turn ambitious ideas into stable, production\\-grade outcomes.
 



  





**What you‚Äôll build and lead** 



* Platform\\-level enhancements that strengthen the reliability, scalability, and intelligence of our testing agent
* On\\-prem and hybrid deployments that demand creativity, security awareness, and adaptability to customer\\-specific environments
* Custom integrations, extensions, and workflow\\-specific features for enterprise customers
* Improvements to stability, performance, and developer experience across our Python backend, agent systems, and React\\-based interfaces
* Delivery and operational processes that ensure smooth implementations and predictable customer success
* A small, high\\-velocity engineering team delivering end\\-to\\-end solutions in fast cycles



  





**Skills we‚Äôre looking for** 



* 8‚Äì10 years of hands\\-on engineering experience building production systems
* Strong expertise in
 **Python** 
 ,
 **React** 
 , and cloud\\-native development with
 **AWS**
* Comfort working in constrained or heterogeneous environments, including on\\-prem and custom customer infrastructure
* Strong architectural thinking and ability to design scalable, maintainable systems
* Experience debugging distributed, environment\\-dependent, or unpredictable systems
* Proven leadership experience mentoring engineers and guiding technical execution
* Clear communication, customer empathy, and the ability to translate complex requirements into actionable solutions
* A bias toward ownership, stability, and long\\-term technical excellence



  





**If you join us, you‚Äôll shape** 



* The technical foundation of KushoAI‚Äôs autonomous testing and maintenance platform
* Our methodologies for on\\-prem and enterprise deployments
* Quality and reliability standards for systems used in critical engineering workflows
* Customer delivery processes that ensure seamless rollout and adoption
* Product direction through direct exposure to real customer challenges
* The culture and operating cadence of a focused, high\\-ownership engineering team



  





**Location** 




 Bangalore, India
 



 Remote\\-first (fully remote for now)

title: Sr. Data Scientist (AI/ML)
description:
**Job Opening: Sr. Data Scientist (AI/ML)** 




 Location: Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India
 



  





 About Us
 



 We are building next\\-generation agentic AI applications that transform recruitment, performance management, and enterprise operations. Our mission is to design intelligent systems that scale globally while staying founder\\-friendly and innovation\\-driven.
 



  





 Role Overview
 



 We are seeking a highly skilled AI/ML Engineer with hands\\-on expertise in Agentic Applications, Retrieval\\-Augmented Generation (RAG), Vespa, MongoDB, and CI/CD pipelines. The ideal candidate will be passionate about architecting scalable AI solutions, integrating advanced search and database technologies, and ensuring seamless deployment workflows.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities
 


* Design, develop, and optimize Agentic AI applications leveraging RAG frameworks.
* Implement and scale Vespa\\-based search and recommendation systems.
* Architect and manage MongoDB databases for storing, indexing, and retrieving large\\-scale structured and unstructured data.
* Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines for rapid, reliable deployment of AI/ML models.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into enterprise platforms.
* Ensure performance, scalability, and robustness of deployed applications.
* Stay updated with emerging AI/ML and database technologies to drive innovation.



  





 Required Skills \\& Experience
 


* Strong background in Machine Learning, NLP, and Agentic AI architectures.
* Proven experience with RAG frameworks and vector databases/search engines (Vespa preferred).
* Hands\\-on expertise with MongoDB: schema design, indexing strategies, aggregation pipelines, and performance tuning.
* Proficiency in CI/CD tools (GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab CI, or similar).
* Solid programming skills in Python, Java, or C\\+\\+ with ML frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow).
* Experience deploying AI models in cloud\\-native environments (AWS, Azure, GCP, Kubernetes).
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and ability to work in fast\\-paced, collaborative settings.



  





 Preferred Qualifications
 


* Prior experience in building agentic AI platforms or intelligent assistants.
* Knowledge of MLOps practices and monitoring tools.
* Familiarity with scalable data pipelines and distributed systems.
* Advanced knowledge of MongoDB Atlas and integration with AI/ML workflows.



  





 Why Join
 



 You‚Äôll be at the heart of global conversations, working with leaders and innovators shaping the future. This is your chance to deliver world\\-class experiences and make a lasting impact. Apply now and be part of mission to connect the world.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**Role:** 
 Senior Backend Engineer (Python/Django)
 



**Function:** 
 Engineering / Backend Development
 



**Location:** 
 India
 



**Industry:** 
 SaaS, Dental Technology, Healthcare IT
 



**Compensation:** 
 30\\-50 LPA
 



  





**About Company** 




 The company is a leading dental practice management platform founded in 2014 by a dental professional. It streamlines clinic operations with integrated tools for scheduling, patient records, billing, financial tracking, marketing automation, and performance reporting.
 



 The platform automates key admin workflows (e.g., reminders and digital intake) and offers a patient portal for viewing treatment history, requesting appointments, and paying online. It integrates with major dental systems and supports single\\- and multi\\-location practices, along with consultants and partner firms‚Äîhelping dental teams operate efficiently and deliver better patient care.
 



  





**Position Overview** 




 You lead a high\\-performing backend team that builds resilient services powering dental practices worldwide. You own architecture decisions, mentor engineers, and push the client‚Äôs expansion into AI\\-driven automation.
 



  





**Role \\& Responsibilities** 



* You provide technical leadership by setting architectural direction, decomposing projects, mentoring engineers, and driving high\\-quality delivery through rigorous reviews.
* You build and evolve backend services and APIs in Django/Python with a focus on performance, reliability, and maintainability.
* You own the data layer by designing efficient relational schemas in PostgreSQL, tuning queries, and managing migrations using SQLAlchemy and Alembic.
* You implement robust CI/CD processes: define branching strategies in Git, automate build/test/deploy pipelines, and ensure safe rollbacks and environment promotion.
* You optimize runtime performance using Redis caching and Nginx reverse proxying to improve throughput, latency, and secure traffic handling.
* You collaborate cross\\-functionally with product and operations teams to translate requirements into executable technical plans.



  





**Must have Criteria** 



* 7‚Äì10 years of software development experience with deep expertise in Python and Django, delivering production web backends and RESTful APIs.
* Proven leadership experience guiding engineers, setting standards, and conducting design and code reviews.
* Strong RDBMS knowledge, including schema design, indexing, transactions, and performance tuning on PostgreSQL.
* Hands\\-on experience with SQLAlchemy and Alembic for model definitions, schema versioning, safe forward/backward migrations, and rollbacks.
* CI/CD and Git expertise: pipeline design, gated testing, release automation, and effective branching/review workflows.
* Practical experience with Redis and Nginx for caching strategies, eviction patterns, and secure high\\-throughput proxying.
* Working knowledge of NoSQL paradigms and understanding when to apply them alongside relational stores.



  





**Nice to Have** 



* Cloud\\-native delivery with Docker/Kubernetes and infrastructure\\-as\\-code within CI/CD workflows.
* Observability practices: metrics, logs, and tracing for performance and reliability improvements.

title: Rust Engineer
description:
**Company Description**
  

 TinkerBloX Inc. is at the forefront of developing ultra\\-efficient and high\\-performance computing solutions that power intelligent systems from silicon to cloud. Specializing in high\\-performance AI and mixed workload execution, our innovative runtime\\-first software stack enables seamless execution on compute instances like CPUs and VMs while adeptly managing GPUs and accelerators. By reducing execution bloat, our platform optimizes packaging, ensures deterministic runtimes, and streamlines modular orchestration across diverse compute nodes. This cutting\\-edge technology delivers increased workload capacity, faster startup times, higher\\-density AI performance, and unparalleled efficiency at scale.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a full\\-time, on\\-site role for a Rust Engineer based in Chennai. The Rust Engineer will be responsible for designing and implementing high\\-performance software systems using the Rust programming language. Key responsibilities include writing clean and efficient code, optimizing system performance, implementing algorithms for workload execution, and collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to design and enhance innovative solutions. The ideal candidate will analyze and debug complex systems while providing technical documentation and support as needed.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Strong proficiency in Rust programming, systems programming, and performance optimization
* Experience in software architecture, algorithm design, and multi\\-threaded programming concepts
* Understanding of low\\-level programming and familiarity with compiler internals
* Knowledge of runtime systems, distributed computing, and workload orchestration
* Proven ability to debug, test, and maintain code in a collaborative and fast\\-paced environment
* Working knowledge of GPUs, cloud computing, and heterogeneous computing environments is advantageous
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills, with a commitment to delivering efficient and reliable software solutions

title: QA Architect (Playwright | Performance | Architecture)
description:
Principal ‚Äì Automation Engineer Role
 



  





**Experiences: 10 ‚Äì 15 Years** 




**Notice Period: Immediate Joiner** 




**Mandatory Skills: Automation, Playwright, Performance testing and Architecture experiences.** 




  





**Job Description:** 




 Architectural and Strategic Leadership
 


* Define Testing Architecture: Architect and drive the implementation of next\\-generation automation and performance testing frameworks, ensuring high scalability, robustness, and maintainability across all product lines.
* Best Practices and Standards: Establish and enforce quality engineering best practices, coding standards, and continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines across the entire testing organization.
* System Integration: Lead technical evaluations and integration of new testing tools and technologies to improve efficiency, coverage, and time\\-to\\-market.
* Mentorship and Coaching: Act as a technical mentor and coach for Senior and Lead Engineers, raising the overall technical acumen and quality mindset of the team.



 Core Technical Focus Areas
 


* **Deep Expertise in Playwright** 
 : Own the design and implementation of robust, resilient end\\-to\\-end (E2E) automation frameworks using Playwright (TypeScript/JavaScript). Drive innovative solutions for testing complex, single\\-page applications (SPAs) and micro\\-frontend architectures.
* **Performance Engineering with k6** 
 : Establish and execute a comprehensive performance testing strategy. Design and run high\\-volume load, stress, and spike tests using k6 (or similar modern tools), analyze results, and partner with development teams to identify and resolve critical performance bottlenecks.
